entry.title: Barry Callebaut - Easymelt Compound Dark Snaps - 20 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barry Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 169.99

Callebaut S12-HP35NV-D33 - Dark Compound Snaps

This chocolate Snaps is excellent in baking recipes, and for moulding and dipping, or eating on its own. These pure chocolate callets are easy to melt or temper, weigh, and store, and a divine taste in recipes calling for chunks of chocolate. Made using 100% pure cocoa butter and a dash of vanilla that rounds off the taste with a slight sweet hint. 
Pure chocolate requires tempering to obtain a high gloss for chocolate making 

  • Kosher dairy

Product of Belgium

entry.title: Wilton - Orange Candy Melts / Wafers 12 Oz - 340g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wilton
Type: BAKING
Price: 5.99

Description

The sweet possibilities are endless with these easy-melt vanilla-flavored orange wafers. Use them to dip strawberries, drizzle them on pretzels or mold them into shaped candies. They can also be used to decorate cakes, cookies and cupcakes, because everything's better when it's covered in candy.

  • Use Candy Melts candy for cake pops, cookies and molded candies with Wilton molds
  • Net weight: 12 oz. (340 g)
  • Candy will lose its consistency if overheated or if liquid has accumulated due to humidity; if this occurs, add 2 teaspoons of vegetable shortening per 12 oz. of candy
  • Candy may melt in bag at warmer temperatures; if this happens, simply follow package directions
  • Contains milk and soy; made on equipment that also processes wheat and peanuts; made in a facility that also processes egg and tree nuts

Disclaimer: BULK MART does NOT recommend shipping chocolate products during the months of June, July, August & September. If you must have chocolate shipped BULK MART recommends choosing the fastest method of shipping possible.

BULK MART CANNOT guarantee the prevention of melting chocolate products, no matter the month or current temperature, even though you may follow our recommendation and CHOOSE the fastest shipping method melting still may occur. Purchase at your own risk.

Cacao Barry NAN-CR-HA5013-T66- Chopped And Caramelized Hazelnuts Praline - 1 Kg

Vacuum Packed Bag Nut based products

These caramelised hazelnut nibs are made of delicious hazelnuts which have been chopped, then caramelised without adding any preservatives.
They are the perfect ingredient for any applications in pastry or confectionery: decoration of cakes and desserts, topping or filling for candy and chocolates.
These chopped, caramelised hazelnuts will bring a nice crunchy effect to your desserts!

Ingredients: sugar 50%, hazelnuts 50%.

entry.title: Cacao Barry - 38% Lactee Superieure Chocolate Pistoles - 5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cocoa Barry
Type: BAKING
Price: 82.99

Cacao Barry CHM-O38LSUP-CA-U77 - 38% Lactee Superieure Chocolate Pistoles - 5 Kg

Dark colored cocoa for a sweet and strong milk chocolate.

Cacao Barry Lactée Supérieure couverture combines successfully the advantages of both a sweet and strong milk chocolate. A dark-colored milk chocolate, Cacao Barry Lactée Supérieure finds itself at home most readily in confectionery, pastry and ice cream. That includes ganache praline centres, fine mouldings and coatings for sweets; such as pastry ganache, mousse or decorations in all manner of pastry; and providing exciting additional flavour to sorbets, ice cream and a wide variety of sauces.

Note: Due to high temperatures or high humidity, chocolate products may melt during shipment. We only ship chocolate during fall/winter/spring months when the temperature is cooler. However, we cannot guarantee that chocolate will not melt during the shipping process. Chocolate that has encountered melting will appear dull coloured or may have greyish/white streaks and dots. This is known as 'bloom' and indicates that the cocoa butter is separating from the chocolate and is rising to the surface. Although not the prettiest in appearance, chocolates with bloom are fine to eat with little inpact to the texture or taste of the chocolate.

- 38.2% min cacao / 38.1% fat / 22.9% milk
- Fluidity level: 4 out of 5
- Pistole format (ie. easy to use chocolate disc format)
- Cacao Barry "Origine" products all come in original Cacao Barry packaging

Disclaimer: BULK MART does NOT recommend shipping chocolate products during the months of June, July, August & September. If you must have chocolate shipped BULK MART recommends choosing the fastest method of shipping possible.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Cocoa Barry
Type: BAKING
Price: 79.99

Cacao Barry CHDQ58MIAMCAU77 - 58% Mi Amere Semi Sweet Chocolate - 5 Kg

This dark couverture chocolate with delicately roasted cocoa taste reveals subtle sourish vegetal hints.

Mi-Amère", this dark couverture chocolate with a delicately roasted cocoa taste reveals subtle sourish vegetal hints.

Ideal for enrobing, molding and ganache fillings.

Couverture is a higher-grade of chocolate than regular chocolate. Couverture contains a higher percentage of cocoa butter, making it more fluid and ideal for dipping, enrobing and molding. This higher content of cocoa butter creates a brilliant shine and crisp snap to the finished candy.  Fluidity 3 out of 5.  Tempering is required.

Contains:
58%  Cocoa
38%  Cocoa Butter

entry.title: Cacao Barry - Inaya 65% Semi Sweet Pistoles - 5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cocoa Barry
Type: BAKING
Price: 87.99

Cacao Barry - Inaya 65% Semi Sweet Pistoles - 5 Kg

A dark chocolate couverture with an intense cocoa taste and the right balance between bitterness and acid notes.
Containing defatted cocoa powder, this Inaya chocolate couverture is excellent for preparations such as ganache or mousse, but also for chocolate drinks.

Each chocolate from the 'Toute la pureté de la nature' range has been created with the pure cocoa beans using the Q-Fermentation™ method. Through mild roasting and slow conching, Cacao Barry's master chocolate makers created three exclusive chocolates. With the Inaya dark chocolate, your dessert creations will take on a whole new dimension.

  • Ingredients: 55% cocoa mass, 31.5% sugar, 12.5% low fat cocoa powder, emulsifier: soy lecithin, natural vanilla flavouring.
  • Cocoa content: 65% minimum

Callebaut - Gold White Chocolate Callets Caramel Taste - 2.5 Kg

This chocolate Callets is excellent in baking recipes, and for moulding and dipping, or eating on its own. These pure chocolate callets are easy to melt or temper, weigh, and store, and a divine taste in recipes calling for chunks of chocolate. Made using 100% pure cocoa butter and a dash of vanilla that rounds off the taste with a slight sweet hint. 
Pure chocolate requires tempering to obtain a high gloss for chocolate making 

  • Kosher dairy

Product of Belgium

Disclaimer: BULK MART does NOT recommend shipping chocolate products during the months of June, July, August & September. If you must have chocolate shipped BULK MART recommends choosing the fastest method of shipping possible.

BULK MART CANNOT guarantee the prevention of melting chocolate products, no matter the month or current temperature, even though you may follow our recommendation and CHOOSE the fastest shipping method melting still may occur. Purchase at your own risk.

Should your chocolate arrive melted, often times they can still be used.
